subject: Amateur Athletics
organizations: Chanelle Price of Easton Area High School
lead_paragraph: Chanelle Price of Easton Area High School in Pennsylvania, the national indoor and outdoor 800 meter champion, posted a meet record of 2 minutes 47.85 seconds Saturday in winning the 1,000 meters at the Bishop Loughlin Games at the New Balance Armory Track and Field Center in Upper Manhattan. Price, a senior who has committed to attending Tennessee next year, led from the start, running a blistering 62.9 seconds for the first 400 and a fast 2:12.1 at the 800 mark in erasing the meet record of 2:50.37.
